Question: Novosound Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Novosound Ltd

Product: Next-Generation Wireless Wearable Ultrasound

- Utilizes revolutionary thin-film technique
- Developed by a team of scientific, technical, and commercial experts
- Showcased at CES 2024 (January 9-12th)
